DataElement.preferredName: Medical Condition Performed Observation Outcome Occurrence Date and Time Range PCORnet CDM Medical Condition Onset Date and Time
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Relating to the study or practice of medicine.:A state of being, such as a state of health.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.:The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation._The onset date concept here refers to the date and time when problem first occurred.
